summary: Makes some of the dogs which can become your followers essential so they can\'t be killed.
descriptionHtml:
Essential dogs for Skyrim
Version 2
25.11.11

By JPro6.

ABOUT

This mod makes the following dogs essential so they cannot be killed:

Meeko
Vigilance
Tiber
Torom
Ysgramor

I do not have a definitive list of which dogs can become followers so I chose these dogs as they seemed likely. I did not want to make all dogs essential as I think some dogs belong to bandits or enemies.

INSTALLATION

Copy the file \"Essential dogs v2.esp\" to your Skyrim\\Data folder and enable it in the Data Files section of the Skryim launcher.

THANKS

Thank you to the people who wrote the uesp.net wiki pages about mod files and the people who made the following softare: Skyrim Viewer, TESSnip and FO3Edit

CHANGELOG

Version 2
Removed one dog as making it essential may have interfered with a quest.

Version 1
Initial release
author: JPro6
